text:
- Our cloud platform has
become a critical enabler
of many of our digital capabilities.
And so ensuring the availability

of the underlying cloud
foundation is really important

for the availability of those
technologies built upon it.

Ally's adoption of the
cloud took place organically

and happened over the
course of a few years.

Some of the workloads that
we had placed in the cloud
weren't optimally designed for the cloud,

so by engaging incident
detection and response,

we were able to standardize
much of how we operate
in the cloud, implement best practices,
and leverage AWS's support

to provide responsive base
level detection and response

so that our team could
engage at the right time
and engage appropriately.

Utilizing AWS Trusted
Advisor and TAM workshops

has enabled us to reduce
our cost per workload

for hosting at AWS by
33% just this year alone.
And within just four months

of adopting incident
detection and response,

we were able to reduce
our meantime to detection

from several hours down
to less than a minute.

We were able to reduce our
meantime to resolution by 50%.

Building on AWS has enabled
a level of responsiveness,

innovation, and agility that
we just simply never had
prior to adopting the cloud.
(upbeat music)
